item.title: Link Failure (Equinix Fabric)
item.content:encoded:
[High] - Dark Fiber Link Flapping in Equinix Fabric Metro Remote

Summary: A dark fiber link between sg3 and ty9 experienced flapping, causing service interruption for Equinix Fabric Metro Remote port and Unprotected Metro Connect circuits, with a 50ms switching hit for Protected Metro Connect circuits. Engineers are currently investigating the issue.

Mar 14, 23:31 UTC
Update - ******DF LINK DOWN/FLAP********
Dark fiber link between sg3 and ty9 flapped

Equinix Fabric Metro Remote port and Unprotected Metro Connect circuits experience service interruption while Protected Metro Connect circuits experienced 50ms switching hit. Equinix engineers are investigating issue.

item.content:encoded:
[High] - Major Equinix Fabric Device Outage Summary: One of the modules in the Equinix Fabric device went down, causing service impact to Equinix Fabric port and virtual connections due to an accidental reload of a wrong module by an engineer during troubleshooting.

Mar 7, 04:57 UTC
Resolved - One of the modules in Equinix Fabric device went down at 3:59 hrs UTC and recovered at 4:11 hrs UTC. Equinix Fabric port and virtual connections without redundancy experienced service impact.
Equinix engineer has accidentally reload a wrong module when doing a troubleshooting for another network issue. No more further activity will be performed on the device and engineers have been reminded to be cautious when performing a task..

item.content:encoded:
[High] - Major Dark Fiber Link Flap

A dark fiber link between ML and DX experienced a flap, causing service interruptions for Equinix Fabric Metro Remote port and Unprotected Metro Connect circuits. Equinix engineers are investigating the issue. Interpreting the text, it is determined to be a major outage impacting the Equinix services due to a network issue.

Mar 2, 21:54 UTC
Update - ******DF LINK DOWN/FLAP********
Dark fiber link between ML and DX flapped.

Equinix Fabric Metro Remote port and Unprotected Metro Connect circuits experience service interruption while Protected Metro Connect circuits experienced 50ms switching hit. Equinix engineers are investigating issue.
